message: Hi, my car won't start this morning. I hear a clicking noise when I turn the key but nothing happens.

I'm sorry to hear that! A clicking sound with no start usually points to an electrical issue — most likely a faulty starter motor or a weak battery. I'll find the nearest garage that can help. Can you confirm your location?
My brake pedal feels really spongy and the car is taking much longer to stop. It's worrying me.

That sounds like a brake system issue — possibly air in the brake lines or worn brake pads. This is a safety concern and should be checked immediately. I've located BrakeMaster Garage nearby. Would you like me to connect you?
My engine is overheating after about 20 minutes of driving. The gauge goes into the red.

An overheating engine can be caused by a coolant leak, a faulty thermostat, or a failing radiator. Please stop driving immediately to avoid engine damage. I'm connecting you to AutoFix London Central who can assist.
My air conditioning isn't blowing cold air anymore. The fan works but it's just warm air coming out.
This is likely a refrigerant issue or a faulty compressor. AC systems need professional recharging equipment to diagnose properly. Let me find an AC specialist near you right away.
Gear changes are rough and there's a grinding noise when I go into third gear.

Grinding during gear changes could indicate worn synchromesh rings or low gearbox oil. I've matched you with Premier Transmission Specialists — they're rated 4.5 stars and close to your location. Shall I book you in?
My front right tyre keeps losing pressure every few days. Think it might be a slow puncture.

A slow puncture can be caused by a small nail, a faulty valve stem, or a damaged bead seal. South London Tyre & Wheel can inspect and repair it quickly. Would you like directions or shall I arrange a call-out?
I've got a big dent on my driver's side door with paint scratched off. Happened in a car park.

I can help with that! Bodywork repairs like dents and paint scratches are best handled by a specialist body shop. I'm searching for the top-rated bodywork garages in your area. Do you have insurance you'd like to use?
Engine warning light has been on for two weeks. Car seems fine but I'm worried.

An engine warning light can mean many things, from a loose fuel cap to a more serious fault. Camden Electrical & Diagnostics can run an OBD-II scan to pinpoint the exact fault code. I'm escalating this to a specialist — they'll be in touch shortly.
Car pulls to the left when I brake and there's a squealing sound. Brakes feel uneven.

Pulling to one side under braking often means a seized brake caliper or unevenly worn pads. Hammersmith Brake & Safety Centre is well-equipped for this. They have a 4.7-star rating. Want me to get them to call you?
The heating in my car only blows cold air even on full heat. No warm air at all.

A heater blowing only cold air usually points to a blocked heater matrix or a faulty heater control valve. West London AC & Heating Experts specialise in exactly this — they're nearby and rated 4.9 stars. Shall I connect you?
Engine is misfiring when I'm idling. There's a slight shudder through the steering wheel at traffic lights.

Engine misfires at idle can be caused by worn spark plugs, a dirty fuel injector, or a faulty ignition coil. I'm looking for an engine specialist close to you — can you share your postcode for a more accurate match?
My rear tyres are wearing unevenly and I have MOT next month. Need them replaced.

Uneven tyre wear often indicates a wheel alignment or suspension issue beyond just needing new tyres. I've found Southwark Speedy Tires nearby. They can replace the tyres and flag any alignment issues. I've escalated for a detailed quote.
My automatic gearbox is slipping between second and third gear at higher speeds.

Transmission slipping is a serious issue and can worsen quickly if not addressed. Stratford Transmission Centre specifies in automatic gearboxes and is close to you. I've arranged for them to contact you within the hour.
I reversed into a bollard and cracked my rear bumper, it's hanging loose now.

A loose bumper is a roadworthiness concern — it can fail an MOT and is a safety hazard. I'm finding bodywork specialists near you who can reattach or replace it. This could be a quick fix depending on the extent of the damage.
Battery warning light appeared and the car struggles to start after sitting overnight.

This typically means the battery isn't holding charge, or the alternator isn't charging it while driving. Canary Wharf Auto Services can run a battery and charging system test. I've connected them to your session.
Oil pressure warning light came on while I was driving on the A406. I've pulled over.

Do NOT restart the engine — driving with low oil pressure can cause catastrophic engine damage. I'm arranging for Finchley Prestige Auto Care to send a technician to your location. Please stay safe and away from traffic.
Front brakes are grinding really badly, metal on metal sound. Pads must be totally gone.

Metal-on-metal grinding means the brake pads have worn through completely and the discs may also be damaged. Please avoid hard braking and drive only if absolutely necessary. Hackney Mechanics Hub can fit new pads and discs today.
I have a cracked windscreen from a stone chip that's spread into a big spider crack.

A crack in the driver's field of view is an automatic MOT failure and an immediate safety concern. I'm searching for bodywork and glazing specialists near you. Does your insurance cover windscreen replacement?
My electric windows stopped working on both front doors after some heavy rain.

Water ingress can short circuit the window motor or the door control module. Ealing Electrical Solutions are skilled in automotive electrical diagnostics. I've escalated your case and they'll reach out to diagnose the fault.
Tyre blew on the M25, I'm on the spare. Need to get two new tyres and check all four.

Glad you're safe! A blowout at motorway speeds is very dangerous. Wimbledon Tyre & Transmission can assess all four tyres and fit new ones. I recommend getting the wheel alignment checked too. I've connected you now.
My clutch is slipping. Engine revs go up but the car barely moves when I accelerate.

Clutch slip means the clutch plate is worn and no longer gripping the flywheel properly. A clutch replacement is typically needed. This will worsen over time. I'm finding transmission specialists close to you now.
Car hesitates when I accelerate, especially from a stop. Fuel usage has got noticeably worse.

Hesitation on acceleration alongside poor fuel economy often points to dirty fuel injectors, a failing mass airflow sensor, or a blocked catalytic converter. Croydon Comprehensive Auto can run a full diagnostic to identify the root cause.
My AC makes a loud rattling noise when I switch it on. It cools a bit but not fully.

Rattling from the AC could be a loose compressor bracket, a worn clutch bearing, or debris in the blower. Lewisham Climate & Engine Care can inspect and repair the full AC system. I've booked you in for a same-day assessment.
I've got a nail in my front left tyre and it's completely flat. I'm stranded.

I'm sending help right away! South London Tyre & Wheel offer a mobile tyre fitting service and can come to your location. I'm dispatching them now — estimated arrival 30–45 minutes. Please stay with your vehicle and hazards on.
I think my alternator is going. Headlights dim when idling and the battery keeps dying.

Dimming lights and repeated battery drain are classic signs of alternator failure. Without a working alternator your car could stall mid-journey. I'm searching for electrical specialists near you who can test and replace it today.
Someone has keyed the entire passenger side of my car. It needs a full respray.

I'm sorry that happened! Fulham Bodywork & Paint are highly rated for full panel resprays and can provide a quote. For insurance purposes, I recommend filing a police report first. I've escalated your case for a detailed estimate.
Engine knocks on cold start but the noise disappears after a few minutes.

Cold-start knocking can indicate low oil pressure, worn piston rings, or carbon build-up. It's important to investigate before it worsens. Islington Engine & Transmission have the diagnostic tools to identify the exact cause.
ABS warning light came on. Braking still feels normal but I'm not sure what's wrong.

An ABS warning light usually means a faulty wheel speed sensor or a low brake fluid level. While your standard braking should still work, you won't have ABS in an emergency stop. Tottenham All-Round Mechanics can diagnose it today.
My gearbox is making a whining noise at all speeds. It's a 6-speed manual. Car still drives.

A whining gearbox usually points to worn bearings or low gearbox oil. It's driveable for now but continuing to drive could cause further damage. I'm matching you with transmission specialists in your area.
My central locking isn't working on the rear doors. Key fob is fine — front doors lock and unlock.

This sounds like a faulty rear door lock actuator — a small motor inside the door that physically locks and unlocks it. Ilford Multi-Service Garage can diagnose and replace the affected actuators. I've connected them to your session.
